channel.title: Gelco Expense Management
channel.description: Gelco Expense Management, Eden Prairie, Minn., is a full-service provider of Services On Demand for global expense management. A division of Gelco Information Network, Gelco Expense Management is the largest provider of global expense management and reimbursement solutions processing over 100,000 transactions and making payments of $20 million per day. For more information about Gelco Expense Management, please visit www.gelco.com.

item.title: Driving Value in Financial Process
item.description: The conversation offers business finance and accounting professionals a vision of how best practices in areas such as travel & entertainment (T&E) expense management, VAT recovery, A/P automation, and payments can impact an organization’s revenue, streamline processes, and increase policy compliance. The participating companies include Gelco Expense Management, Meridian, Metafile, and Ruesch International.
item.itunes:summary: The conversation offers business finance and accounting professionals a vision of how best practices in areas such as travel & entertainment (T&E) expense management, VAT recovery, A/P automation, and payments can impact an organization’s revenue, streamline processes, and increase policy compliance. The participating companies include Gelco Expense Management, Meridian, Metafile, and Ruesch International.
